instructions: IMPORTANT: Use Claude Checkpoints MCP tools for tracking changes:
1. Call start_task('task name') BEFORE starting any task (max 30 chars)
2. Call complete_task('task name', 'summary') AFTER completing the task
3. This creates automatic checkpoints with clear task descriptions
Example: start_task('Fix login bug') ... do work ... complete_task('Fix login bug', 'Fixed SQL injection vulnerability')

usage: start_task: Call BEFORE starting work (max 30 chars)
complete_task: Call AFTER finishing work to create checkpoint
create_checkpoint: Manual checkpoint with custom message

name: checkpoints_for_claude_code_page
